# IMG ARENA

## Home

- [Welcome](https://docs.imgarena.com/welcome): Explore our range of betting and media offerings and let us elevate your sporting journey to new heights. Get ready to unleash your passion for sports with us!

## Ice Hockey

- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/overview): This comprehensive guide provides information on our consumer-facing APIs and WebSockets, enabling seamless connections between our clients and us.
- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/overview)
- [Using the REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/overview/using-the-rest-api): The REST API follows standard REST patterns.
- [Authentication](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/overview/authentication): Application credentials are required for production and simulation environments and cannot be shared publicly.
- [Pagination](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/overview/pagination): Pagination means results are divided into pages, requiring multiple requests to access all data.
- [Rate Limits](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/overview/rate-limits): Our APIs rely on rate limits to help provide a predictably pleasant experience for users.
- [Error Handling](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/overview/error-handling): Knowing potential error messages for efficient API integration is crucial when using public data requests.
- [Seasons](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/seasons): List and manage competition seasons.
- [Fixtures](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/fixtures): List and manage competition fixtures for specific seasons under their client license.
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/squads): List and manage all players registered to a squad within a given competition.
- [Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/actions): List and manage player actions.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/rest-api/statistics): List of aggregated player, sport and team match actions which produce statistics like goals, cards, shots, number of attacks and more.
- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/live-websockets/overview)
- [Using the WebSockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/live-websockets/overview/using-the-websockets): The WebSocket API provides a powerful technology for establishing two-way interactive communication between users and the FastPath server.
- [Authentication](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/live-websockets/overview/authentication): Application credentials are required for production and simulation environments and cannot be shared publicly.
- [Rate Limits](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/live-websockets/overview/rate-limits): Our WebSockets rely on rate limits to help provide a predictably pleasant experience for users.
- [Actions (Betting)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/live-websockets/actions-betting): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload.
- [Statistics (Betting)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/live-websockets/statistics-betting): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
- [Action Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/data-points/action-types): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Game Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/data-points/game-statistics)
- [Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects)
- [Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/action): Represents the player action details of a match.
- [Game Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/game-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match actions by action types.
- [Advanced Sport Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/advanced-sport-statistics): Represents the advanced statistics for a given match.
- [Category](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/category): Represents the category details of a team or competition.
- [Club](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/club): Represents the club details of a team.
- [Competition](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/competition): The competition object represents a structured set of information that defines a specific competition or league.
- [Continent](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/continent): Represents the location details of a continent where a competition to be played.
- [Country](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/country): Represents the location details of a country where a competition to be played.
- [Fixture](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/fixture): Represents the fixture's details.
- [Fixture Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/fixture-action)
- [Fixture Summary](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/fixture-summary): Represents the summary of the fixture details.
- [Location](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/location): Represents the location details of a tournament or season.
- [Metadata](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/metadata): Provides essential contextual information about a sports event, including the coverage level, fixture status, collection status, and reason codes for collection status.
- [Period](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/period): Represents the period's details.
- [Period Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/period-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given period within a match.
- [Player (Action)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/player-action): Represents the player details in the actions feed.
- [Player Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/player-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of match actions by each player.
- [Season](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/season): The season object represents a set of information specific to a particular season.
- [Squad](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/squad): Represents the player information of a squad.
- [Stage (Fixture)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/stage-fixture): Represents a stage details of an event.
- [Stage (Season)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/stage-season): Represents a stage details of an event.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/statistics): Represents the statistics object
- [Sub Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/sub-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match sub actions by sub action types.
- [Team](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/team): Represents a team's details.
- [Team Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/team-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given match.
- [Venue](https://docs.imgarena.com/ice-hockey/objects-and-enumaration/objects/venue): Represents the venue.

## Snooker

- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/overview): This comprehensive guide provides information on our consumer-facing APIs and WebSockets, enabling seamless connections between our clients and us.
- [Getting Started](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/overview/getting-started)
- [Using the REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/overview/using-the-rest-api): The REST API follows standard REST patterns.
- [Using the WebSockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/overview/using-the-websockets): The WebSocket API provides a powerful technology for establishing two-way interactive communication between users and the FastPath server.
- [Pagination](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/overview/pagination)
- [Error Handling](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/overview/error-handling)
- [Rest API](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/rest-api): The FastPath Schedule API enables you to get information about seasons, fixtures, squads and actions within a specific fixture. It gives you statistical information, too.
- [Seasons](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/rest-api/seasons): The Seasons API offers developers a convenient way to list and manage snooker seasons.
- [Fixtures](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/rest-api/fixtures): List all fixtures.
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/rest-api/squads): The Squads API lets developers list and manage all players registered to a squad within a given competition.
- [Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/rest-api/actions): List of team and player actions within a match, including information for scores, penalties and more.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/rest-api/statistics): List of aggregated player, sport and team match actions which produce statistics like goals, cards, shots, number of attacks and more.
- [Proxy API](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/rest-api/proxy-api): This section provides comprehensive information on snooker seasons, tournaments, tournament rounds, matches, sessions, players' data, players' rankings, and draws.
- [Live Websockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-websockets)
- [Betting - Live actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-websockets/betting-live-actions): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload for betting customers.
- [Betting - Live statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-websockets/betting-live-statistics): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
- [Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects): JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a widely used data interchange format that is lightweight and easy to read.
- [Static Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects)
- [Competition](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/competition): Represents the competition details of an event to be played.
- [Category](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/competition/category): Represents the category details of a team or competition.
- [Fixture](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/fixture): Represents the fixture's details.
- [Player (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/player-squad): Represents the player details in the Squads feed.
- [Season](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/season): A snooker season, organised by the World Snooker Tour (WST), is a series of snooker tournaments played from June to May the following year
- [Squad](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/squad): Represents the player information of a squad.
- [Stage](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/stage): Represents the stage details of an event.
- [Round](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/stage/round): Represents the round details of a stage during an event.
- [Team (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/team-squad): Represents a team's details in the Squads feed.
- [Tour](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/tour): Represents the tour details of a season.
- [SubVenue](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/subvenue): Represents the subvenue details of a tournament or season.
- [Venue](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/subvenue/venue): Represents the venue details of a tournament or season.
- [Location](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/subvenue/venue/location): Represents the location details of a tournament or season.
- [Country](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/subvenue/venue/location/country): Represents the location details of a country where a competition to be played.
- [Continent](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/static-objects/subvenue/venue/location/continent): Represents the location details of a continent where a competition to be played.
- [Live Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects)
- [Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/action): Represents the player action details of a match.
- [Fixture Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/action/fixture-action)
- [Metadata](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/action/metadata): Provides essential contextual information about a sports event, including the coverage level, fixture status, collection status, and reason codes for collection status.
- [Fixture Summary](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/action/fixture-summary): Represents the summary of the fixture details.
- [Club](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/club): Represents the club details of a team.
- [Venue](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/venue): Represents the venue details of a tournament or season.
- [Location](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/venue/location): Represents the location details of a tournament or season.
- [Country](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/venue/location/country): Represents the location details of a country where a competition to be played.
- [Continent](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/venue/location/continent): Represents the location details of a continent where a competition to be played.
- [Period](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/period): Represents the period's details.
- [Potted Balls](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/potted-balls): Represents the potted balls details within advanced statistics for a tournament.
- [Remaining Balls](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/live-objects/remaining-balls): Represents the remaining balls snooker advanced statistics for a given tournament.
- [Player (Action)](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/player-action): Represents the player details in the actions feed.
- [Team](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/team): Represents the details of a team.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/statistics)
- [Team Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/statistics/team-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given match.
- [Game Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/statistics/game-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match actions by action types.
- [Period Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/statistics/period-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given period within a match.
- [Player Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/statistics/player-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of match actions by each player.
- [Sub Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/statistics/sub-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match sub actions by sub action types.
- [Advanced Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics)
- [Advanced Sport Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics/advanced-sport-statistics): Represents the advanced statistics for a given game.
- [Frames Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics/frames-statistics): Represents the frame and period details within advanced statistics for a given game.
- [Breaks Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics/breaks-statistics): Represents the break details within advanced statistics for a given tournament.
- [Breaks](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics/breaks-statistics/breaks): Represents the break details within advanced statistics for a tournament.
- [Remaining Ball Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics/remaining-ball-statistics): Represents the remaining ball snooker advanced statistics for a given tournament.
- [Games Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics/games-statistics): Represents the game details within advanced statistics for a given match.
- [Players Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/objects/advanced-statistics/players-statistics): Represents the player's advanced statistics for a given tournament.
- [Action Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/action-types): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/statistics): This page describes all parameters related to live soccer match statistics.
- [Game Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/statistics/game-statistics)
- [Player Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/statistics/player-statistics)
- [Advanced Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/advanced-statistics): Advanced statistical data points provided for snooker.
- [Frame Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/advanced-statistics/frame-statistics)
- [Player Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/advanced-statistics/player-statistics)
- [Live Data Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-data-scenarios)
- [Force Frame Win](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-data-scenarios/force-frame-win)
- [Frame score](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-data-scenarios/frame-score): A single game of snooker is called a frame.
- [Frame number](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-data-scenarios/frame-number): A single game of snooker is called a frame.
- [Points in the current frame](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-data-scenarios/points-in-the-current-frame): A single game of snooker is called a frame.
- [Striker / Player at the table](https://docs.imgarena.com/snooker/live-data-scenarios/striker-player-at-the-table): The player at the table is called the Striker.

## Tennis

- [Tennis on DDE](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/master)
- [Documentation](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1)
- [Tennis Scoring Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/tennis-scoring-types): The various standards of scoring across all Tennis included in our portfolio.
- [How are Event ID's structured?](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/how-are-event-ids-structured)
- [Tournaments vs Competitions](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/tournaments-vs-competitions)
- [Draws vs OOPs](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/draws-vs-oops)
- [ATP - Round Robin Tournaments](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/round-robin-tournaments)
- [United Cup](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/round-robin-tournaments/united-cup)
- [API Information](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/api_information)
- [Connecting Programmatically](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/connecting-programmatically)
- [Reconnecting To An Event](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/documentation-1/reconnecting-to-an-event)
- [Schedule Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1)
- [Data Frequency for Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/frequency-of-rest-requests)
- [Live Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-liveevents): This endpoint lists the currently live booked events for which you are licenced. This allows you to determine which events have live streams available.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-liveevents/response-model): An array of live event objects.
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-liveevents/sample-response): An example from the Tournaments Live Events end point in December 2024
- [Full Live events schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-liveevents/full-live-events-schema)
- [Tournaments](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments/response-model)
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments/sample-response): Tournament endpoint an example JSON response made for Roland Garros 2024
- [Full Tournaments schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments/full-tournaments-schema)
- [Specific Tournament](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id): This endpoint returns details for a specific tournament if the id is valid and you are licenced for it
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id/response-model)
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id/sample-response): An example of a request for the tournament end point for the BNP Paribas Open, Indian Wells
- [Tournament Draws](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-draws): This endpoint lists the draws for a tournament. This includes the placeholders for matches in each round of the competition.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-draws/response-model): A map of competitionType -> Draw objects, populated with players where they are known.
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-draws/sample-response): An example JSON response of a draws endpoint for the ATP Hamburg European Open in Hamburg, Germany 2022.
- [Full Tournaments Draw schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-draws/full-tournaments-draw-schema)
- [Tournaments Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-events)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-events/response-model): An array of Event objects.
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-events/sample-response): An example from the tournament events endpoint JSON response from Roland Garros 2024
- [Full Tournaments Events schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-events/full-tournaments-events-schema)
- [Competitions Draws](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-draws): This endpoint lists the draws for a competition. This includes the placeholders for matches in each round of the competition.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-draws/response-model): The response format is the same as the one of the /tournaments/{id}/draws endpoint.
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-draws/sample-response): An example Competition Draw from the Roland Garros 2024.
- [Full Competition draws schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-draws/full-competition-draws-schema)
- [Competitions Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-events): This endpoint lists the events for a competition for which you are licensed. Please note that the list of events is incomplete and will generally only show previous events and events for today and tom
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-events/response-model): A map of competitionType -> Draw objects, populated with players where they are known.
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-events/sample-response): An example Competition Events from the Roland Garros 2024.
- [Full Competition events schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/competitions-id-events/full-competition-events-schema)
- [Tournaments Results](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-results): This endpoint lists the results from a specific tournament, as a list of final match scores.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-results/response-model)
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-results/sample-response): A snippet of an example of the Tournaments Results end point from Roland Garros 2024.
- [Full Tournaments results schem](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/tournaments-id-results/full-tournaments-results-schem)
- [Players Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/players)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/players/response-model): An array of player details objects.
- [Sample Response](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful-1/players/sample-response): A snippet of the /players endpoint, with rankings from December 2024
- [Stream Endpoints (Websockets)](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets)
- [Connecting to the Stream Endpoints](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/connecting-to-the-stream-endpoints): The Stream API provides a stream of live match data as JSON over a WebSocket connection. Please see the below for how to connect to the stream endpoint.
- [Events Streams](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/events-id-stream-tennis)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/events-id-stream-tennis/response-model)
- [Full Events Streams schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/events-id-stream-tennis/full-events-streams-schema): Please find a breakdown of the full schema for /events endpoint
- [Events Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/events-id-statistics-tennis)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/events-id-statistics-tennis/response-model)
- [Full Events Statistics schema](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/events-id-statistics-tennis/full-events-statistics-schema): Please find a breakdown of the full schema for /statistics endpoint
- [Test Streams](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/test-streams)
- [Live Data Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1)
- [Pre-Match](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/pre-match)
- [The Basics](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/the-basics)
- [Undo Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/undo-events)
- [Overruling of Points](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/overruling-of-points)
- [Point Replayed](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/point-replayed)
- [Time Violations](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/time-violations)
- [Code Violations, Game Penalties & Defaults](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/code-violations-game-penalties-and-defaults)
- [Medical Timeout](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/medical-timeout)
- [Forfeiting Points / Umpire Modifying the Score](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/forfeiting-points-umpire-modifying-the-score)
- [Toilet Break](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/toilet-break)
- [Challenge](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/challenge)
- [Ball Mark Inspection (Clay Only)](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/ball-mark-inspection-clay-only)
- [Event Disconnections](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/event-disconnections)
- [Delayed Packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/delayed-packets)
- [Suspensions](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/suspensions)
- [Retirements](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/retirements)
- [Match Finished](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/live-data-scenarios-1/match-finished)
- [P\&B Tracking (Websockets)](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/p-and-b-tracking-websockets): This section summarises the Player & Ball Tracking Websockets that are available via the DDE
- [Connecting to the Stream Endpoints](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/p-and-b-tracking-websockets/connecting-to-the-stream-endpoints): The Stream API provides a stream of live match data as JSON over a WebSocket connection. Please see the below for how to connect to the stream endpoint.
- [P\&B Tracking - Rally](https://docs.imgarena.com/tennis/p-and-b-tracking-websockets/p-and-b-tracking-rally): This section summarises the Rally player & ball tracking websocket that is available via the DDE.

## Volleyball

- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/overview): This comprehensive guide provides information on our consumer-facing APIs and WebSockets, enabling seamless connections between our clients and us.
- [Getting Started](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/overview/getting-started)
- [Using the REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/overview/using-the-rest-api): The REST API follows standard REST patterns.
- [Using the WebSockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/overview/using-the-websockets): The WebSocket API provides a powerful technology for establishing two-way interactive communication between users and the FastPath server.
- [Pagination](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/overview/pagination)
- [Error Handling](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/overview/error-handling)
- [Rest API](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/rest-api): The FastPath Schedule API enables you to get information about seasons, fixtures, squads and actions within a specific fixture. It gives you statistical information, too.
- [Seasons](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/rest-api/seasons): The Seasons API offers developers a convenient way to list and manage competition seasons.
- [Fixtures](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/rest-api/fixtures): List all fixtures.
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/rest-api/squads): The Squads API lets developers list and manage all players registered to a squad within a given competition.
- [Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/rest-api/actions): List of team and player actions within a match, including information for scores, penalties and more.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/rest-api/statistics): List of aggregated player, sport and team match actions which produce statistics like goals, cards, shots, number of attacks and more.
- [Live Websockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/live-websockets)
- [Betting - Live actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/live-websockets/betting-live-actions): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload for betting customers.
- [Betting - Live statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/live-websockets/betting-live-statistics): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
- [Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects): JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a widely used data interchange format that is lightweight and easy to read.
- [Static Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects)
- [Fixture](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects/fixture): Represents the details of a fixture.
- [Player (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects/player-squad): Represents the player details in the Squads feed.
- [Season](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects/season): Represents the season's details.
- [Squad](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects/squad): Represents the player information of a squad.
- [Stage](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects/stage): Represents the stage details of an event.
- [Team (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects/team-squad): Represents a team's details in the Squads feed.
- [Tour](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/static-objects/tour): Represents the tour details of a season.
- [Live Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects)
- [Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/action): Represents the player action details of a match.
- [Fixture Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/action/fixture-action)
- [Metadata](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/action/metadata): Provides essential contextual information about a sports event, including the coverage level, fixture status, collection status, and reason codes for collection status.
- [Fixture Summary](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/action/fixture-summary): Represents the summary of the fixture details.
- [Category](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/category): Represents the category details of a team or competition.
- [Club](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/club): Represents the club details of a team.
- [Competition](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/competition): Represents the competition details of an event to be played.
- [Venue](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/venue): Represents the venue details of a tournament or season.
- [Location](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/venue/location): Represents the location details of a tournament or season.
- [Country](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/venue/location/country): Represents the location details of a country where a competition to be played.
- [Continent](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/venue/location/continent): Represents the location details of a continent where a competition to be played.
- [Period](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/live-objects/period): Represents the period's details.
- [Player](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/player): Represents the player details.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/statistics)
- [Team Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/statistics/team-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given match.
- [Game Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/statistics/game-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match actions by action types.
- [Period Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/statistics/period-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given period within a match.
- [Player Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/statistics/player-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of match actions by each player.
- [Sub Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/statistics/sub-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match sub actions by sub action types.
- [Team](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/objects/team): Represents the details of a team.
- [Action Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/action-types): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Indoor Volleyball](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/action-types/indoor-volleyball): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Beach Volleyball](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/action-types/beach-volleyball): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Frequently Asked Questions](https://docs.imgarena.com/volleyball/frequently-asked-questions)

## Table Tennis

- [Getting Started](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/master): Get started with building your application using our Table Tennis API, that provides fast and reliable static and live data for tournaments, matches and competitions.
- [Fundamentals](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/documentation-1)
- [Getting Access](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/documentation-1/getting-access): How to get access to the IMG Arena Table Tennis API
- [Websockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/documentation-1/websockets)
- [Testing](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/documentation-1/connecting-programmatically): Learn about the different methods to test your integration before going live.
- [World Table Tennis (WTT)](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/documentation-1/major-championships): Technical Documentation provided by WTT
- [Major Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/documentation-1/round-robin-tournaments)
- [Schedule API](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful): You can use the Table Tennis REST API to create calls to get the data you need to integrate with IMG Arena.
- [Live Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/live-events): This endpoint lists the currently live booked events for which you are licenced. This allows you to determine which events have live streams available.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/live-events/response-model): An array of live-event matches
- [Tournaments](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1)
- [List of Tournaments](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/tournaments)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/tournaments/response-model)
- [Specific Tournament](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/specific-tournament): This endpoint returns details for a specific tournament if the id is valid and you are licenced for it
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/specific-tournament/response-model)
- [Sample Output](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/specific-tournament/sample-output)
- [Tournament Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/untitled-2)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/untitled-2/response-model)
- [Sample Output](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/untitled-2/sample-output)
- [Tournament Draws](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/untitled): This endpoint lists the draws for a tournament. This includes the placeholders for matches in each round of the competition.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/untitled/response-model)
- [Sample Output](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/untitled/sample-output)
- [Tournament Results](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/tournament-results): This endpoint lists the results from a specific tournament, as a list of final match scores.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/tournament-results/response-model)
- [Sample Output](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/tournaments-1/tournament-results/sample-output)
- [Competitions](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/competitions)
- [Competition Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/competitions/competition-events)
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/competitions/competition-events/response-model)
- [Sample Output](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/competitions/competition-events/sample-output)
- [Competition Draws](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/competitions/untitled-1): The response format is the same as the one of the /tournaments/{id}/draws endpoint.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/competitions/untitled-1/response-model)
- [Sample Output](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/schedule-endpoints-restful/competitions/untitled-1/sample-output)
- [Stream API](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets): You can use the Table Tennis REST API to create calls to get the data you need to integrate with IMG Arena.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model)
- [Packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets)
- [Correction packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/correction-packets)
- [Correction objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/correction-packets/correction-objects)
- [Undo](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/correction-packets/correction-objects/undo)
- [Correction (Score Edit)](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/correction-packets/correction-objects/correction-score-edit)
- [Scoring packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/scoring-packets)
- [PointStarted packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/scoring-packets/pointstarted-packets)
- [PointScored packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/scoring-packets/point-scored)
- [Sanctions packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/sanctions-packets)
- [Sanction packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/sanctions-packets/sanction-packets)
- [PenaltyPoints packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/sanctions-packets/penaltypoints-packets)
- [Swap packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/swap-packets)
- [SwapServe packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/swap-packets/swapserve-packets)
- [SwapSides packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/swap-packets/swapsides-packets)
- [MatchStatusUpdate packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchstatusupdate-packets)
- [Match Status objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchstatusupdate-packets/match-status-objects)
- [PlayersConfirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchstatusupdate-packets/match-status-objects/notstarted): Status update once the players have been confirmed.
- [InProgress](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchstatusupdate-packets/match-status-objects/finished): Status update once the game is started.
- [Timeout](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchstatusupdate-packets/match-status-objects/timeout)
- [MatchFinished packets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets): This packet indicates the reason a match was finished.
- [MatchFinished objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets/matchfinished-objects)
- [Normally](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets/normally)
- [Injury](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets/injury)
- [Disqualification](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets/disqualification)
- [Walkover](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets/walkover)
- [Retired](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets/retired)
- [Unknown Reason](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/stream-endpoints-websockets/response-model/packets/matchfinished-packets/unknown-reason)
- [Live Data Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios)
- [01. Pre-Match](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/pre-match): This section will describe the packets that are received upon the start of the match. At the start of every table tennis match, the same packets should be received in the same order.
- [02. During a Match](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match)
- [Scoring](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/scoring): Basic packets about point scoring during a game.
- [Serves](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/the-basics): Basic packets about swapping sides and serves during a game.
- [Correction](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/undo-events): In an event of making a mistake when entering information into the match scoresheet, the problem should be fixed and correct scores should be published.
- [Timeouts](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/timeouts): Each player has one timeout per match lasting up to 60 seconds along with a brief towel-off breaks at every 6 points during a match.
- [Sanctions](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/sanctions): Both players and coaches may be sanctioned during a match. A Sanction packet will be emitted in such scenarios, describing the player that was sanctioned, and which sanction(s) have been applied.
- [Penalties](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/sanctions/game-penalties)
- [Disqualification](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/sanctions/disqualification): The referee has the power to disqualify a player from a match, an event or a whole competition by holding up a red card. The umpire can also issue a red card to coaches.
- [Expediting](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/during-a-match/expedite-rule): This regulation in table tennis, also known as the Expedite System, begins after 10 minutes of gameplay and fewer than 18 total points have been recorded.
- [03. Post-Match](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/live-data-scenarios/post-match)
- [NEW Table Tennis Multisport (Comms April 2025)](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025)
- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/overview): This comprehensive guide provides information on our consumer-facing APIs and WebSockets, enabling seamless connections between our clients and us.
- [Getting Started](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/overview/getting-started)
- [Using the REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/overview/using-the-rest-api): The REST API follows standard REST patterns.
- [Using the WebSockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/overview/using-the-websockets): The WebSocket API provides a powerful technology for establishing two-way interactive communication between users and the FastPath server.
- [Pagination](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/overview/pagination)
- [Error Handling](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/overview/error-handling)
- [REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/rest-api): The FastPath Schedule API enables you to get information about seasons, fixtures, squads and actions within a specific fixture. It gives you statistical information, too.
- [Seasons](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/rest-api/seasons): The Seasons API offers developers a convenient way to list and manage competition seasons.
- [Fixtures](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/rest-api/fixtures): List all fixtures.
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/rest-api/squads): The Squads API lets developers list and manage all players registered to a squad within a given competition.
- [Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/rest-api/actions): List of team and player actions within a match, including information for scores and more.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/rest-api/statistics): List of aggregated player, sport and team match actions which produce statistics like point started, point scored, cards and more
- [Live Websockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/live-websockets)
- [Betting - Live actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/live-websockets/betting-live-actions): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload for betting customers.
- [Betting - Live statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/live-websockets/betting-live-statistics): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, point played, point scored, cards and more.
- [Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/objects)
- [Action Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/action-types): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Frequently Asked Questions](https://docs.imgarena.com/table-tennis/new-table-tennis-multisport-comms-april-2025/frequently-asked-questions)

## Soccer

- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/overview): This comprehensive guide provides information on our consumer-facing APIs and WebSockets, enabling seamless connections between our clients and us.
- [Getting Started](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/overview/getting-started)
- [Using the REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/overview/using-the-rest-api): The REST API follows standard REST patterns.
- [Using the WebSockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/overview/using-the-websockets): The WebSocket API provides a powerful technology for establishing two-way interactive communication between users and the FastPath server.
- [Pagination](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/overview/pagination)
- [Error Handling](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/overview/error-handling)
- [Rest API](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api): The FastPath Schedule API enables you to get information about seasons, fixtures, squads and actions within a specific fixture. It gives you statistical information, too.
- [Seasons](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api/seasons): The Seasons API offers developers a convenient way to list and manage competition seasons.
- [Fixtures](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api/fixtures): List all fixtures.
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api/squads): The Squads API lets developers list and manage all players registered to a squad within a given competition.
- [Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api/actions): List of team and player actions within a match, including information for scores, penalties and more.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api/statistics): The data will include all teams and players within a match and aggregated statistics of sports actions.
- [Standings](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api/standings): This endpoint returns the aggregated team standings for a specific season. Per each competition and season. Currently this endpoint only supports MLS and MLS Next Pro competitions.
- [Lineups](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/rest-api/lineups): The Lineups API lets developers get a list of lineups for a fixture when they are known.
- [Live Websockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-websockets)
- [Betting - Live actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-websockets/betting-live-actions): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload for betting customers.
- [Betting - Live statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-websockets/betting-live-statistics): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
- [Media - Live actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-websockets/media-live-actions): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload for media customers.
- [Media - Live statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-websockets/media-live-statistics): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
- [MLS - P\&B Tracking (Websockets)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/mls-p-and-b-tracking-websockets): This section summarises the players, ball and referee tracking websockets that are available via the DDE.
- [Connecting to the tracking websocket](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/mls-p-and-b-tracking-websockets/connecting-to-the-tracking-websocket): This API provides a stream of live players, ball and referee tracking data as JSON over a WebSocket connection. Please see the below for how to connect.
- [Low latency tracking feed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/mls-p-and-b-tracking-websockets/low-latency-tracking-feed): This section details and describes the payload which contains the home and away players, the ball and referee positions.
- [Page](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/page)
- [Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects): JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a widely used data interchange format that is lightweight and easy to read.
- [Static Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects)
- [Fixture](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/fixture): Represents the fixture's details.
- [Player (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/player-squad): Represents the player details in the Squads feed.
- [Season](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/season): Represents the season's details.
- [Squad](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/squad): Represents the player information of a squad.
- [Stage](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/stage): Represents the stage details of an event.
- [Team (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/team-squad): Represents a team's details in the Squads feed.
- [Tour](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/tour): Represents the tour details of a season.
- [Lineups](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/static-objects/lineups): Represents the information of a lineup.
- [Live Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects)
- [Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/action): Represents the player action details of a match.
- [Fixture Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/action/fixture-action)
- [Metadata](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/action/metadata): Provides essential contextual information about a sports event, including the coverage level, fixture status, collection status, and reason codes for collection status.
- [Fixture Summary](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/action/fixture-summary): Represents the summary of the fixture details.
- [Category](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/category): Represents the category details of a team or competition.
- [Club](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/club): Represents the club details of a team.
- [Competition](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/competition): Represents the competition details of an event to be played.
- [Venue](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/venue): Represents the venue details of a tournament or season.
- [Location](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/venue/location): Represents the location details of a tournament or season.
- [Country](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/venue/location/country): Represents the location details of a country where a competition to be played.
- [Continent](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/venue/location/continent): Represents the location details of a continent where a competition to be played.
- [Period](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/live-objects/period): Represents the period's details.
- [Player](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/player): Represents the player details.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/statistics)
- [Team Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/statistics/team-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given match.
- [Game Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/statistics/game-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match actions by action types.
- [Period Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/statistics/period-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given period within a match.
- [Player Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/statistics/player-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of match actions by each player.
- [Sub Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/statistics/sub-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match sub actions by sub action types.
- [Team](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/team): Represents the details of a team.
- [Rules](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/objects/rules): Represents the rules of the fixture
- [Action Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/action-types): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/statistics): This page describes all parameters related to live soccer match statistics.
- [Player Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/statistics/player-statistics)
- [Team Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/statistics/team-statistics)
- [Live Data Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios)
- [Team Colours](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/team-colours)
- [Close Market - Pending](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/close-market-pending)
- [Close Market - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/close-market-confirmed)
- [Player Returned - Pending](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/player-returned-pending)
- [Player Returned - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/player-returned-confirmed)
- [Player Left - Pending](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/player-left-pending)
- [Player Left - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/player-left-confirmed)
- [Match Delayed - Pending](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/match-delayed-pending)
- [Match Delayed - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/match-delayed-confirmed)
- [Video Check Underway - Pending](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/video-check-underway-pending)
- [Video Check Underway - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/video-check-underway-confirmed)
- [Red Card - Pending](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/red-card-pending)
- [Red Card - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/red-card-confirmed)
- [Match Conditions](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/match-conditions)
- [Lineup](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/lineup)
- [Kick Off (Pending & Confirmed)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/kick-off-pending-and-confirmed)
- [Attack](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/attack)
- [Dangerous Attack](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/dangerous-attack)
- [Safe](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/safe)
- [Throw In (Pending & Confirmed)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/throw-in-pending-and-confirmed)
- [Yellow Card (Pending, Confirmed & Deleted)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/yellow-card-pending-confirmed-and-deleted)
- [Red Card (Pending & Confirmed) & Potential](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/red-card-pending-and-confirmed-and-potential)
- [Goal, Goal Disallowed,Goal Deleted and Goal Updated](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/goal-goal-disallowed-goal-deleted-and-goal-updated)
- [Corner (Pending & Confirmed)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/corner-pending-and-confirmed)
- [Substitutions](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/substitutions)
- [Penalty Awarded (Pending, Confirmed, Deleted) & Missed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/penalty-awarded-pending-confirmed-deleted-and-missed)
- [Penalty Retake (Pending & Confirmed)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/penalty-retake-pending-and-confirmed)
- [Goal Kick (Confirmed)](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/goal-kick-confirmed)
- [Stop Clock](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/stop-clock)
- [End Period](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/end-period)
- [Match Delayed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/match-delayed)
- [Play Stopped/Play Resumed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/play-stopped-play-resumed)
- [Open Market](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/open-market)
- [Closed Market](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/closed-market)
- [Distress](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/distress)
- [Penalty Shootout](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/penalty-shootout)
- [Match Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/match-statistics)
- [Collection Suspended/Dropped](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/collection-suspended-dropped)
- [VAR](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var)
- [Video Check Started](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-started)
- [Other](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-started/other)
- [Potential Penalty](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-started/potential-penalty)
- [Potential Disallowed Goal](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-started/potential-disallowed-goal)
- [Cancelled](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-started/cancelled)
- [Video Check Result](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-result)
- [Goal Allowed](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-result/goal-allowed)
- [No Penalty](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/video-check-result/no-penalty)
- [No Video Check](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/no-video-check)
- [Possible Video Check](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/var/possible-video-check)
- [Temporary Dismissals](https://docs.imgarena.com/soccer/live-data-scenarios/temporary-dismissals)
