## Basketball

- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/overview): This comprehensive guide provides information on our consumer-facing APIs and WebSockets, enabling seamless connections between our clients and us.
- [Getting Started](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/overview/getting-started)
- [Using the REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/overview/using-the-rest-api): The REST API follows standard REST patterns.
- [Using the WebSockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/overview/using-the-websockets): The WebSocket API provides a powerful technology for establishing two-way interactive communication between users and the FastPath server.
- [Pagination](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/overview/pagination)
- [Error Handling](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/overview/error-handling)
- [Rest API](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api): The FastPath Schedule API enables you to get information about seasons, fixtures, squads and actions within a specific fixture. It gives you statistical information, too.
- [Seasons](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api/seasons): The Seasons API offers developers a convenient way to list and manage competition seasons.
- [Fixtures](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api/fixtures): List all fixtures.
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api/squads): The Squads API lets developers list and manage all players registered to a squad within a given competition.
- [Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api/actions): List of team and player actions within a match, including information for scores, penalties and more.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api/statistics): List of aggregated player, sport and team match actions which produce statistics like goals, cards, shots, number of attacks and more.
- [Standings](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api/standings): This endpoint returns the aggregated team standings for a specific season. Per each competition and season.
- [Live Websockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/live-websockets)
- [Betting - Live actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/live-websockets/betting-live-actions): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload for betting customers.
- [Betting - Live statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/live-websockets/betting-live-statistics): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
- [Media - Live actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/live-websockets/media-live-actions): This section provides details and descriptions of the values in the actions payload for media customers.
- [Media - Live statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/live-websockets/media-live-statistics): Provide aggregated data of matches such as statistics, scores, line-ups used for analysis and visualisation.
- [Live P\&B Tracking](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/live-websockets/live-p-and-b-tracking): This section details and describes the values within the P\&B tracking payload.
- [Action Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/action-types): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [JSON Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects): JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a widely used data interchange format that is lightweight and easy to read.
- [Static Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects)
- [Fixture](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects/fixture): Represents the fixture's details.
- [Player (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects/player-squad): Represents the player details in the Squads feed.
- [Season](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects/season): Represents the season's details.
- [Squad](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects/squad): Represents the player information of a squad.
- [Stage](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects/stage): Represents the stage details of an event.
- [Team (Squad)](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects/team-squad): Represents a team's details in the Squads feed.
- [Tour](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/static-objects/tour): Represents the tour details of a season.
- [Live Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects)
- [Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/action): Represents the player action details of a match.
- [Fixture Action](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/action/fixture-action)
- [Metadata](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/action/metadata): Provides essential contextual information about a sports event, including the coverage level, fixture status, collection status, and reason codes for collection status.
- [Fixture Summary](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/action/fixture-summary): Represents the summary of the fixture details.
- [Category](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/category): Represents the category details of a team or competition.
- [Club](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/club): Represents the club details of a team.
- [Competition](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/competition): Represents the competition details of an event to be played.
- [Venue](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/venue): Represents the venue details of a tournament or season.
- [Location](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/venue/location): Represents the location details of a tournament or season.
- [Country](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/venue/location/country): Represents the location details of a country where a competition to be played.
- [Continent](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/venue/location/continent): Represents the location details of a continent where a competition to be played.
- [Period](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/period): Represents the period's details.
- [Player (Action)](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/player-action): Represents the player details in the actions feed.
- [Team (Action)](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/live-objects/team-action): Represents a team's details in the actions feed.
- [Stats Objects](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects)
- [Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match actions by action types.
- [Advanced Sport Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/advanced-sport-statistics): Represents the advanced statistics for a given match.
- [Breaks Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/breaks-statistics): Represents the break details within advanced statistics for a given tournament.
- [Frames Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/frames-statistics): Represents the frame and period details within advanced statistics for a given match.
- [Games Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/games-statistics): Represents the game details within advanced statistics for a given match.
- [Period Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/period-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given period within a match.
- [Player Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/player-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of match actions by each player.
- [Players Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/players-statistics): Represents the player's advanced statistics for a given tournament.
- [Sub Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/sub-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all match sub actions by sub action types.
- [Team Action Aggregates](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/json-objects/stats-objects/team-action-aggregates): Represents the aggregated statistics of all team actions for a given match.
- [Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/statistics): This page describes all parameters related to live soccer match statistics.
- [Team Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/statistics/team-statistics)
- [Player Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/statistics/player-statistics)
- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api-1/overview)
- [Using the REST API](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api-1/overview/using-the-rest-api): The REST API follows standard REST patterns.
- [Frequently Asked Questions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api-1/frequently-asked-questions)
- [Live Data Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api-1/live-data-scenarios): This page details some FAQ regarding our data collection process of certain actions
- [Turnover](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api-1/live-data-scenarios/turnover)
- [Rebounds](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball/rest-api-1/live-data-scenarios/rebounds): This page details various different rebound types including:

## UFC

- [UFC on the DDE](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/master)
- [Schedule Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful)
- [Fightcards Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/fightcards-endpoint): This endpoint returns information on all fight cards, past and present. This is kept up to date every 5 minutes.
- [Fightcards Schedule Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/fightcards-schedule-endpoint)
- [Live Events Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/live-events-endpoint): This endpoint returns information on a fight when it is live
- [Results Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/results-endpoint)
- [Detailed Results Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/detailed-results-endpoint)
- [Fighters Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/fighters-endpoint)
- [Fighter Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/fighter-endpoint)
- [WeightClasses Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/weightclasses-endpoint)
- [Rankings Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/schedule-endpoints-restful/rankings-endpoint)
- [Stream Endpoints (WebSocket)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/stream-endpoints-websocket)
- [Fight Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/stream-endpoints-websocket/fight-actions)
- [Fight Details](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/stream-endpoints-websocket/fight-details)
- [Fight Stats](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/stream-endpoints-websocket/fight-stats)
- [Fight Details Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/fight-details-scenarios)
- [Fight Open / Closed](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/fight-details-scenarios/fight-open-closed)
- [Clock Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/fight-details-scenarios/clock-actions)
- [Fighter Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/fight-details-scenarios/fighter-actions)
- [End of Fight](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/fight-details-scenarios/end-of-fight)
- [Connection Statuses](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/fight-details-scenarios/connection-statuses)
- [Undos/Insertions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc/fight-details-scenarios/undos-insertions)

## Golf Integration Documentation

- [Operator Integration Instructions](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/master)
- [PreTournament Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/pretournament-event-centre): To preview these pages please visit our Demo Tool. Please contact Support or Integration Managers for details.
- [Insights - Live Automated Commentary](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/insights-live-automated-commentary): To preview these pages please visit our Demo Tool. Please contact Support or Integration Managers for details.
- [GEC Leaderboard with Markets](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/gec-leaderboard-with-markets)
- [Demo](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/gec-leaderboard-with-markets/demo)
- [Context Driven Markets Display](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/context-driven-markets-display)
- [Video Stream Authentication](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/video-stream-authentication)
- [Device/Browser Support Matrix](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/device-browser-support-matrix): Please find the link below to our Device Browser Support Matrix
- [Release Management](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/release-management)
- [Release communication](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/release-management/release-communication): How new Releases will be communicated to all Operators
- [Changelog](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/release-management/changelog)
- [Static data](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/static-data): You will first need to create a database or gather a list tournaments and their associated groups per round. This can be achieved by pulling our Tournament and Schedule endpoint.
- [Tournament(s) Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/static-data/tournament-s-endpoint): Full specification for the Tournaments endpoint.
- [Schedule Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/static-data/schedule-endpoint): full specification for the schedule endpoint.
- [Players Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/static-data/players-endpoint)
- [Data Frequency for Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/static-data/data-frequency-for-endpoints-restful)
- [Sandbox examples](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/sandbox-examples)
- [Native Integration](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/native-integration)
- [Languages Translations Available](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/languages-available): The list below shows the languages we currently have available. We are able to add any other language upon request.
- [SDK Solution](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/sdk-solution)
- [Android SDK](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/sdk-solution/android-sdk)
- [iOS SDK](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/sdk-solution/ios-sdk)
- [Par 3 Streaming with 3 & 2 Ball Markets](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/par-3-streaming-with-3-and-2-ball-markets)
- [FAQ](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/faq): Please view the following list of frequently asked questions, hopefully it can help you integrate the Golf event centre more efficiently:
- [Weekly simulations](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-event-centre-integration-documentation/weekly-simulations)

## UFC

- [Operator Integration Instructions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/master)
- [SDK Integration](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/sdk-integration)
- [Android SDK](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/sdk-integration/android-sdk)
- [iOS SDK](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/sdk-integration/ios-sdk)
- [UFC EC Modules](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules): The Event Centre supports being initialised with a specific UI state. This is achieved by passing in a "Context Update" message object, when initialising the Event Centre.
- [Full Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules/full-event-centre): The following provides steps on how to implement an Event Centre with all features.
- [Fight Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules/fight-event-centre): The following provides steps on how to implement an Event Centre to a specific fight with or without navigation.
- [Fightcard Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules/fightcard-event-centre): The following provides steps to embed just the fight card without navigation.
- [Matchup Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules/matchup-event-centre): The following provides steps on how to implement an Event Centre to a specific matchup view without navigation.
- [Tape Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules/tape-event-centre): The following provides steps on how to implement an Event Centre to a specific tape view without navigation.
- [Stats Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules/stats-event-centre): The following provides steps on how to implement an Event Centre to a specific tape view without navigation.
- [Striking Event Centre](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-ec-modules/striking-event-centre): The following provides steps on how to implement an Event Centre to a specific striking view without navigation.
- [Video Stream Authentication](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/video-stream-authentication)
- [Video Stream Restrictions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/video-stream-restrictions): Please note that streaming restrictions are present for the following territories
- [Device/Browser Support Matrix](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/device-browser-support-matrix): Please find the link below to our Device Browser Support Matrix
- [Static Data](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/building-static-data): You will first need to create a database or gather a list of "fightcards" (a list of events) and the fights associated to the fightcard/event.
- [Fightcards Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/building-static-data/fightcards-endpoint): This endpoint returns information on all fight cards, past and present.
- [Fightcards Schedule Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/building-static-data/fightcards-schedule-endpoint): This endpoint returns information on the schedule of a particular fightcard.
- [Data Frequency for Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/building-static-data/data-frequency-for-endpoints-restful)
- [Release Management](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/release-management)
- [Native Integration](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/native-integration)
- [Language Translations Available](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/language-translations-available): The list below shows the languages we currently have available. We are able to add any other language upon request.
- [FAQ](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/faq)

* [Инструкция по интеграции оператора](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/master)
* [Модули Центра мероприятий UFC](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc): Центр мероприятий поддерживает инициализацию с определенным состоянием пользовательского интерфейса, достигаемым путем передачи в процессе инициализации объекта сообщения «Обновление контекста».
* [Весь Центр мероприятий](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc/ves-centr-meropriyatii): Ниже приведен порядок действий по имплементации Центра мероприятий со всеми функциями.
* [Центр мероприятий в режиме «Fight»](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc/centr-meropriyatii-v-rezhime-fight): Ниже приведен порядок действий по имплементации Центра мероприятий в объеме конкретного боя, как с навигацией, так и без нее.
* [Центр мероприятий в режиме «Fightcard»](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc/centr-meropriyatii-v-rezhime-fightcard): Ниже приведен порядок действий по встраиванию только файткарда, без возможности навигации.
* [Центр мероприятий в режиме «Matchup»](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc/centr-meropriyatii-v-rezhime-matchup): Ниже приведен порядок действий по имплементации Центра мероприятий в объеме просмотра конкретной пары, без возможности навигации.
* [Центр мероприятий в режиме «Tape»](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc/centr-meropriyatii-v-rezhime-tape): Ниже приведен порядок действий по имплементации Центра мероприятий в объеме просмотра конкретного послужного списка, без возможности навигации.
* [Центр мероприятий в режиме «Stats»](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc/centr-meropriyatii-v-rezhime-stats): Ниже приведен порядок действий по имплементации Центра мероприятий в объеме просмотра конкретного послужного списка, без возможности навигации.
* [Центр мероприятий в режиме «Striking»](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/moduli-centra-meropriyatii-ufc/centr-meropriyatii-v-rezhime-striking): Ниже приведен порядок действий по имплементации Центра мероприятий в объеме просмотра конкретных ударов, без возможности навигации.
* [Аутентификация запросов потокового видео](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/video-stream-authentication): Описание страницы (необязательно)
* [Матрица поддержки устройств/браузеров](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/device-browser-support-matrix): Please find the link below to our Device Browser Support Matrix
* [Статические данные](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/building-static-data): Сначала вам нужно будет создать базу данных либо сформировать перечень «файткардов» (перечень мероприятий) и связанных с соответствующим файткардом/мероприятием боев.
* [Конечная точка файткардов](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/building-static-data/fightcards-endpoint): Данная конечная точка позволяет получить информацию обо всех файткардах, как прошлых так и нынешних.
* [Конечная точка расписания файткардов](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/building-static-data/fightcards-schedule-endpoint): Данная конечная точка позволяет получить информацию о расписании конкретного файткарда.
* [Частота передачи данных по конечным точкам (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/building-static-data/data-frequency-for-endpoints-restful)
* [Управление выпусками](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/release-management)
* [Собственная интеграция](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/native-integration)
* [Доступные переводы на другие языки](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/language-translations-available): В приведенном ниже перечне показаны доступные в настоящее время иноязычные версии. По требованию мы можем добавить любую другую иноязычную версию.
* [Часто задаваемые вопросы](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-russian/chasto-zadavaemye-voprosy)

- [Instrucciones de integración del operador](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/master)
- [Módulos de Centro de Eventos UFC](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc): El Centro de eventos de UFC admite la inicialización en 7 configuraciones modulares diferentes. Esto se hace proporcionando el nombre del módulo dentro del campo "targetModule".
- [Centro de Eventos Completo](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc/centro-de-eventos-completo): A continuación se proporcionan los pasos para implementar un Centro de Eventos con todas las funciones.
- [Centro de Eventos de Pelea](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc/centro-de-eventos-de-pelea): A continuación se proporcionan pasos sobre cómo implementar un Centro de eventos para una pelea específica, con o sin navegación.
- [Centro de Eventos de Cartelera](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc/centro-de-eventos-de-cartelera): A continuación se proporcionan los pasos para incrustar solo la cartelera, sin navegación.
- [Centro de Eventos de Emparejamiento](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc/centro-de-eventos-de-emparejamiento): A continuación se proporcionan pasos sobre cómo implementar un Centro de Eventos en una vista de emparejamiento específica, sin navegación.
- [Centro de Eventos de Cinta](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc/centro-de-eventos-de-cinta): A continuación se proporcionan pasos sobre cómo implementar un Centro de Eventos en una vista de cinta específica, sin navegación.
- [Centro de Eventos de Estadísticas](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc/centro-de-eventos-de-estadisticas): A continuación se proporcionan pasos sobre cómo implementar un Centro de Eventos en una vista de estadísticas, sin navegación.
- [Centro de Eventos Golpes](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/modulos-de-centro-de-eventos-ufc/centro-de-eventos-golpes): A continuación se proporcionan pasos sobre cómo implementar un Centro de Eventos en una vista de golpes específica, sin navegación.
- [Autenticación de transmisión de video](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/video-stream-authentication)
- [Matriz de soporte de dispositivo/navegador](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/device-browser-support-matrix): Please find the link below to our Device Browser Support Matrix
- [Datos estáticos](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/building-static-data): Primero deberá crear una base de datos o recopilar una lista de "fightcards" (lista de eventos) y de las peleas asociadas a la cartelera/evento.
- [Punto final de Carteleras](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/building-static-data/fightcards-endpoint): Este punto final devuelve información sobre todas las carteleras, pasadas y presentes.
- [Punto final Calendario de Cartelera](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/building-static-data/fightcards-schedule-endpoint): Este punto final devuelve información sobre el calendario de una cartelera en particular.
- [Frecuencia de datos para terminales (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/building-static-data/data-frequency-for-endpoints-restful)
- [Gestión de versiones](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/release-management)
- [Integración nativa](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/native-integration)
- [Idiomas disponibles](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/language-translations-available): La siguiente lista muestra los idiomas que tenemos disponibles actualmente. Podemos agregar cualquier otro idioma a pedido.
- [Preguntas frecuentes](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-5.0/ufc-5.0-latam-spanish/preguntas-frecuentes)

## Event Centres Common Docs

- [Event Centres Common Docs](https://docs.imgarena.com/event-centres-common-docs/event-centres-common-docs): Matters that apply to all Event Centres
- [Device/Browser Support Matrix](https://docs.imgarena.com/event-centres-common-docs/event-centres-common-docs/device-browser-support-matrix)

## Golf

- [Golf - Media](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/master): Area describing Golf Media Feeds
- [Static Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled)
- [Tournament(s)](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/tournament-s)
- [Entrylist](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/entrylist)
- [Schedule](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/schedule)
- [Live Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/live-events)
- [Players](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/players)
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/squads): \*FOR MATCHPLAY EVENTS ONLY\*
- [End of Round Strokes](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/end-of-round-strokes): A feed which includes all of the key meta data per shot within a Team's round, compiled and stored, once a Round becomes Official.
- [Play By Play Shot Commentary](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/play-by-play-shot-commentary): This endpoint returns play by play (PBP) shot commentary to be used for significant match play events such as the Ryder Cup as well as top stroke play events.
- [Course Fingerprints](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/course-fingerprints): This endpoint returns a variety of data points about the course and its context
- [Golf Entry List Data](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/golf-entry-list-data): This endpoint returns data for each player via the entry list of the tournament indicated in the endpoint parameter
- [Golf AI Commentary](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/golf-ai-commentary): This endpoint returns shot commentary to be used for front end UI products such as the Golf Event Centre, but can also be delivered as REST endpoint data feeds
- [Websocket - REST APIs](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/websocket-rest-apis)
- [Polling limits](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/untitled/polling-limits)
- [WebSockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets)
- [Leaderboard](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/leaderboard)
- [Team Hole-By-Hole Score](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/team-hole-by-hole-score)
- [Team Round Details](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/team-round-details)
- [Player Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/player-stats): This endpoint is a live WebSocket endpoint that returns the full set up player statistics for all rounds in a given tournament.
- [Player Statistics Rankings](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/player-statistics-rankings)
- [Hole Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/hole-statistics)
- [Leaderboard - Match Play](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/leaderboard-match-play)
- [Match Score - Match Play](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/match-score-match-play)
- [Team Match Details - Match Play](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/websockets/team-match-details-match-play)
- [Round Details & Match Details Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios): This section contains information on the different round & match details scenarios that can occur. You can find more details on the dedicated page for each scenario on the menu to the left.
- [Heartbeats](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/heartbeats)
- [Round: Started / Finished / Official](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/round-started-finished-official)
- [Hole started/finished](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/hole-started-finished)
- [Standard Stroke Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/standard-stroke-events)
- [Ball Drops and Penalty Stroke](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/ball-drops-and-penalty-stroke)
- [Provision Ball Selected](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/provision-ball-selected)
- [Corrections](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/corrections)
- [Hole Correction Mode](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/hole-correction-mode)
- [Hole Score Update](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/hole-score-update)
- [(Dis)connection States](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/dis-connection-states)
- [Playoffs](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/round-details-and-match-details-scenarios/playoffs)
- [Weekly Simulations](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/weekly-simulations)

* [Golf on the DDE](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/master)
* [Schedule Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest)
* [Tournament(s)](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/tournament-s)
* [Entrylist](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/entrylist)
* [Schedule](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/schedule)
* [Live Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/live-events)
* [Players](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/players)
* [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/squads): \*FOR MATCHPLAY EVENTS ONLY\*
* [End of Round Strokes](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/end-of-round-strokes): A feed which includes all of the key meta data per shot within a Team's round, compiled and stored, once a Round becomes Official.
* [Websocket - REST APIs](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/websocket-rest-apis): Most of the Golf websockets are available via REST calls. Please find a breakdown below:
* [Polling limits](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-rest/polling-limits)
* [Stream Endpoints (WebSocket)](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream)
* [Leaderboard](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/leaderboard)
* [Team Hole-By-Hole Score](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/team-hole-by-hole-score)
* [Team Round Details](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/team-round-details)
* [Player Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/player-statistics): Please note statistics are only available for events after the 16th June 2022.
* [Player Statistics Rankings](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/player-statistics-rankings): Please note statistics are only available for events after the 16th June 2022.
* [Hole Statistics](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/hole-statistics): Please note statistics are only available for events after the 16th June 2022.
* [Leaderboard - Match Play](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/match-play-leaderboard)
* [Match Score - Match Play](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/match-play-scoreboard): Applies when Tournament(s)/\`format\`="Match"
* [Team Match Details - Match Play](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/feed-specifications/endpoints-stream/team-match-details-match-play): Applies when Tournament(s)/\`format\`="Match"
* [Round Details & Match Details Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios)
* [Heartbeats](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/heartbeats)
* [Round: Started / Finished / Official](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/round-started-finished-official)
* [Hole: Started / Finished](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/hole-started-finished)
* [Standard Stroke Events](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/standard-stroke-events)
* [Ball Drops and Penalty Strokes](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/ball-drop)
* [Provision Ball Selected](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/provision-ball-selected)
* [Corrections](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/corrections)
* [Hole Correction Mode](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/hole-correction-mode)
* [Hole Score Update](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/hole-score-update)
* [(Dis)connection States](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/dis-connection-states)
* [Playoffs](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/round-details-scenarios/playoffs)
* [Ryder Cup](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/example-json-responses/ryder-cup): Example data from 2018 Ryder Cup
* [Presidents Cup](https://docs.imgarena.com/golf-media/golf/example-json-responses/presidents-cup)

## UFC

- [UFC on the DDE](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/master)
- [Schedule Endpoints (RESTful)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful)
- [Fightcards Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/fightcards-endpoint): This endpoint returns information on all fight cards, past and present. This is kept up to date every 5 minutes.
- [Fightcards Schedule Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/fightcards-schedule-endpoint)
- [Live Events Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/live-events-endpoint): This endpoint returns information on a fight when it is live
- [Results Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/results-endpoint)
- [Detailed Results Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/detailed-results-endpoint)
- [Fighters Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/fighters-endpoint)
- [Fighter Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/fighter-endpoint)
- [WeightClasses Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/weightclasses-endpoint)
- [Rankings Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/schedule-endpoints-restful/rankings-endpoint)
- [Stream Endpoints (WebSocket)](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/stream-endpoints-websocket)
- [Fight Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/stream-endpoints-websocket/fight-actions)
- [Fight Details](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/stream-endpoints-websocket/fight-details)
- [Fight Stats](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/stream-endpoints-websocket/fight-stats)
- [Fight Details Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/fight-details-scenarios)
- [Fight Open / Closed](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/fight-details-scenarios/fight-open-closed)
- [Clock Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/fight-details-scenarios/clock-actions)
- [Fighter Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/fight-details-scenarios/fighter-actions)
- [End of Fight](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/fight-details-scenarios/end-of-fight)
- [Connection Statuses](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/fight-details-scenarios/connection-statuses)
- [Undos/Insertions](https://docs.imgarena.com/ufc-media-feed/fight-details-scenarios/undos-insertions)

## Basketball

- [Basketball on the DDE](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/basketball-on-the-dde)
- [APIs](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/basketball-on-the-dde/apis)
- [Websockets](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/basketball-on-the-dde/websockets)
- [Schedule API](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api): The FastPath API enable you to get information about seasons, fixtures, squads and actions within a specific fixture. It also gives you statistical information about a game.
- [Seasons](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api/seasons): List all seasons and competitions.
- [Fixtures](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api/fixtures): List all fixtures.
- [Fixtures (old)](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api/fixtures-old)
- [Squads](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api/squads)
- [Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api/actions)
- [Match Stats](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api/match-stats)
- [Standings API (Coming Soon)](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/schedule-api/standings-api-coming-soon)
- [Stream Endpoints (Websocket)](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/stream-endpoints-websocket)
- [Live Actions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/stream-endpoints-websocket/live-actions)
- [Action Types](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/stream-endpoints-websocket/live-actions/action-types): The below information details the key FastPath actions and sub action types we will be collecting live and distributing via the live Actions WebSocket.
- [Response Model](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/stream-endpoints-websocket/live-actions/response-model): This section details and describes the values within the actions payload (replaces the swagger actions websocket doc)
- [Periods Object](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/stream-endpoints-websocket/live-actions/response-model/periods-object)
- [Fixture Action Object](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/stream-endpoints-websocket/live-actions/response-model/fixture-action-object)
- [Live Match Statistics - Box Score](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/stream-endpoints-websocket/live-match-statistics-box-score)
- [Live Data Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios/live-data-scenarios)
- [Live Data Scenarios](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1)
- [Team Colours](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1/team-colours)
- [Match Conditions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1/match-conditions)
- [Lineup](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1/lineup)
- [Attack](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1/attack)
- [Substitutions](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1/substitutions)
- [Substitution Out - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1/substitutions/substitution-out-confirmed)
- [Substitution In - Confirmed](https://docs.imgarena.com/basketball-media/live-data-scenarios-1/substitutions/substitution-in-confirmed)

## BetLink - Integration Documentation

- [Overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/overview)
- [Environments](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/environments)
- [Markets and Selections](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/markets-and-selections)
- [Bet Placement](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/bet-placement)
- [Operator Integration Instructions v5.0](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/front-end-integration/operator-integration-instructions-v5.0): BetLink iFrame integration
- [Operator authentication](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/front-end-integration/operator-authentication): Describes the operator authentication flow
- [Video Stream Authentication](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/front-end-integration/video-stream-authentication): Overview of the video authentication flow
- [Languages Translations Available](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/front-end-integration/languages-translations-available): The list below shows the languages we currently have available. We are able to add any other language upon request.
- [Device/Browser Support Matrix](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/front-end-integration/device-browser-support-matrix): Please find the link below to our Device Browser Support Matrix
- [Release Management](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/front-end-integration/release-management)
- [Release communication](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/front-end-integration/release-management/release-communication): How new Releases will be communicated to all Operators
- [Introduction](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/introduction)
- [Security](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/security)
- [Idempotency](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/idempotency)
- [Session Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/session-endpoint)
- [Auth Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/auth-endpoint): Path: {operator-env-url}/authenticate
- [Bet Placement Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/bet-placement-endpoint): Path: {operator-env-url}/bet
- [Multiples Bet Placement Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/multiples-bet-placement-endpoint): Path: {operator-env-url}/bet/multiple
- [Void Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/void-endpoint): Path: {operator-env-url}/void
- [Multiples Void Endpoint (V1 - Deprecated)](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/multiples-void-endpoint-v1-deprecated): Path: {operator-env-url}/void/multiple
- [Multiples Void Endpoint (V2)](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/multiples-void-endpoint-v2): Path: {operator-env-url}/void/multiple/v2
- [Selection Result Endpoint](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/backend-integration/selection-result-endpoint): Path: {operator-env-url}/result
- [Golf](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/sports-trading-data/golf): All information required for trading team to manage Bet Link for Golf
- [Support model](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/support/support-model)
- [Contact](https://docs.imgarena.com/betlink-integration-documentation/support/contact): Who to contact at wha stage of the integration

## StreamBet SDK Integration

- [Getting started](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/getting-started): To get going to with the Interactive Streaming product integration, follow the below:
- [Visual Integration Guide](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/visual-integration-guide): Visual guide to the integration of main features.
- [Configuration overview](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/configuration-overview)
- [Generating a token](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/generating-a-token): How to get the streaming token.
- [Markets](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/markets)
- [Placing a bet](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/placing-a-bet): How to place a bet using Interactive Streaming.
- [MultiStream](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/multistream)
- [Customising themes](https://docs.imgarena.com/streambet-sdk-integration/customising-themes)
